feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Healthcare API
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Healthcare API

entry.content:
• Accept-Encoding compression headers on DICOM frame requests that contain uncompressed pixel data (as defined by the DICOM transfer syntax) are now supported and can return compressed results

Note: For very large downlinks and very large files where downlink vastly outpaces compression speed, latency may slightly increase. Compression can be disabled by not including the header in these cases.
entry.summary: `Accept-Encoding` headers are now supported for DICOM frame requests with uncompressed pixel data, allowing for compressed results.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Compression Support

entry.content: Preview: Cloud Healthcare API has launched DICOM Updates and Patches. This allows customers to update their DICOM data in-place. For more information, see Update and patch DICOM studies, series, and instances.
entry.summary: The Cloud Healthcare API now supports updating DICOM data in-place, simplifying data management.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Updates and Patches Now Available

entry.content: The Healthcare Natural Language API is deprecated and will be shut down on May 27, 2026. For more information, see Deprecations.
entry.summary: The Healthcare Natural Language API is being deprecated and will be shut down on May 27, 2026. For more information, please refer to the deprecations page.
entry.title: Deprecated: Healthcare Natural Language API Deprecation
